title: Charming Virginia Heritage Hot Springs Resort with Bathhouse, Two Golf Courses & Water Park
description: Step into the illustrious footsteps of presidents past and experience the rich heritage and timeless elegance of this grand homestead among the rolling hills of Virginia's Allegheny Mountains. From the majestic Great Hall to the rejuvenating natural hot springs, every corner of this retreat exudes elegance. Splash around at the water park or head to the golf courses. Relax at The Spa at Omni Homestead before savouring local delights at one of eight charming restaurants and bars.
offer_address: 7696 Sam Snead Highway, Hot Springs, Virginia 24445, USA
